item.title: OCaml Weekly News, 19 Jul 2022
item.description:
1. Gopcaml-mode and Gopcaml-mode merlin (0.0.6) - Phoenix release (Support for OCaml 4.14.0!)
  2. Sandmark Nightly - Benchmarking as a Service
  3. OCamlFormat Web Configurator
  4. Jane Street is Hiring Front End Engineers
  5. BAP 2.5.0 Release
  6. Why I used OCaml to developed a utility to download Jira items
  7. Liquidsoap 2.1.0
  8. Vim now highlights types, feedback welcome
  9. Other OCaml News
